daily_activities: Sightseeing: Visit the Ram Janmabhoomi temple
Dining: Try local cuisine at a traditional restaurant
Adventure Sports: Take a boat ride on the Saryu River
Museums: Explore the Ayodhya Museum to learn about the city's history
Hiking: Trek to the nearby Faizabad city
Shopping: Buy local handicrafts and souvenirs at the Ayodhya market
Sightseeing: Visit the Hanuman Garhi temple
Nightlife: Enjoy the evening aarti at the Ram Janmabhoomi temple
Dining: Have a picnic lunch at the Gulab Bari garden
Sightseeing: Explore the Kanak Bhavan temple

travel_instructions.route_details: Take a train from Ahmedabad Junction (ADI) to Ayodhya Junction (AY) via the Ahmedabad - Varanasi route, with possible changes at cities like Surat or Varanasi.
